ActCanada Consumer Product Safety Act
SubjectRegulations Amending the Toys Regulations (Magnetic Toys)
PrecisRegulations Amending the TOYS REGULATIONS (MAGNETIC TOYS) in order to (1) set out specific requirements under the existing Regulations that will help to protect children from the serious ingestion hazard posed by small powerful magnets in toys, consolidating the requirements with other Canadian safety requirements for toys; and (2) align Canadaâ€™s regulatory requirements and tests for this hazard with those applied in the United States and the European Union.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2018-0138 Publication Date: 2018-07-11
